code: import React,{useState,useEffect}from"react";import"./Experience.css";import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const Experience=()=>{const[experiences,setExperiences]=useState([]);useEffect(()=>{fetch("Experience.json").then(res=>res.json()).then(data=>setExperiences(data)).catch(err=>console.error("Failed to load experience:",err));},[]);return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ExperiencePage",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Experience"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("hr",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ExperienceList",children:experiences.map((exp,index)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"ExperienceCard",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"ExperienceContainer",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"LogoColumn",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("img",{src:exp.eImage,alt:`${exp.empName} logo`,className:"EmployerLogo"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"DetailsColumn",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"TopRow",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{className:"JobTitle",children:exp.position}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("span",{className:"Period",children:exp.period})]}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("strong",{className:"EmployerName",children:exp.empName}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{className:"Description",children:exp.description.split('\n').map((line,idx)=>/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("span",{children:[line,/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("br",{})]},idx))})]})]})}))})]});};export default Experience;
